caption: Figure 2: Overview of SBI Dataset
description: The chart displays the distribution of math word problems across six sub-categories within the Schema-Based Instruction dataset.

caption: Figure 4: Confusion matrix for the schema classifier
description: The confusion matrix visualizes the performance of the schema classifier, showing the counts of correctly and incorrectly classified instances across six schema sub-categories.

caption: Figure 5: Training and validation losses for the schema classifier
description: The chart displays the training and validation losses of a schema classifier model over 20 epochs, showing model convergence.

caption: Figure 6: Reasoning Score SBI-RAG vs GPT-4
description: The bar chart compares the reasoning scores of SBI-RAG and GPT-4, showing that SBI-RAG achieved a significantly higher reasoning score.
section: F Reasoning Score Metric and Implementation

caption: Figure 7: Reasoning Score SBI-RAG vs GPT 3.5 Turbo
description: The bar chart compares the reasoning scores of SBI-RAG and GPT 3.5 Turbo models, showing that SBI-RAG achieved a significantly higher score.
